r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * added line compression into 'prefilter' rule (from the current 'tighten' rule) * changed 'tighten' rule back to its original behavior (i.e., remove all newlines) * moved 'tighten' rule to next-to-last in the default rule set * sorry to keep moving things around, this is alpha code after all :-( * added extra newline to returned 'table' parsing, fixes paragraph breaks
